about_the_game:
The outfits are themed around law enforcement, allowing you to pick a side and go all in. These outfits will make you the star on either side of the law.

The Boys in Blue Tailor Pack contains four outfits, masks, and gloves.

Outfits
  • Flight Risk
  • Riot Con
  • Supermax
  • Jailbird

Masks
  • Clownpunk
  • Clowninator
  • Mad Mask Raider
  • Killer K9

Gloves
  • Elmer’s
  • Digi Swipe
  • Suave Grippers
  • Star Cut

The Boys in Blue Tailor Pack is also available as part of the Boys in Blue Chapter 2 Bundle.

content_descriptors.notes: PAYDAY 3 contains repeated displays of gun violence, including the shooting of civilians and law enforcement. PAYDAY 3 references alcohol and tobacco as well as illegal drugs in a lighthearted way.
